install.name: myjobs

param.name: coreapp
param.label: Core Application
param.description: Causes this application to not appear in the users applications list but it will allow this application to appear in the user profile automatically if selected.

param.name: limit
param.label: Limit
param.description: Limit the length of the content (default is 50).

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of comment to display (default is 10)

param.name: cats
param.label: Categories
param.description: You can display categories froma a specific category. Write the category id with comma seperated like 25,36,65

param.name: introtext
param.label: Introtext
param.description: Select whether to display the description of job.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this plugin

param.name: show_user_type
param.label: User Type?
param.description: You can show the user type in profiles or not?
